Title: Andi and Olivia
Writer: Andy Baker (story), Tom Edge, Ed Macdonald (story)
Actors: Hannah Britland, Klariza Clayton, Johnny Flynn, Florence Hall
Plot: Dylan and the group attends Abigail's Literary Festival. Meanwhile Evie feels jealous that herself and Dylan had years to figure things out, while him and Abigail seem to be doing just fine. Evie moves in with Luke.
